name: Game Space
intro: GameFi as a Service for large gaming companies and AAA titles
introduce:
Game Space provides a one-stop GameFi as a Service (GaaS) for large gaming companies and Gamefi projects. Working as middleware, Game Space helps traditional games to seamlessly migrate to the blockchain, and take advantage of their game development and distribution, to produce AAA-level GameFi.
Game Space will offer multiple functions such as IGO, Mystery box, and Marketplace. Moreover, customized functions can be developed to meet the diversified needs of game manufacturers and provide users with more diversified NFT assets and trading scenarios.
